slide.title: Drupal 6.19 HipHop
slide.example: |0077aa|~>| siege -c 5 -b -t30s http://drupal6/ ** SIEGE 2.67 ** Preparing 5 concurrent users for battle. The server is now under siege... Lifting the server siege... done. Transactions: 1579 hits Availability: 100.00 % Elapsed time: 29.20 secs Data transferred: 2.40 MB Response time: *0.09 secs* Transaction rate: *54.08 trans/sec* Throughput: 0.08 MB/sec Concurrency: 4.98 Successful transactions: 1579 Failed transactions: 0 Longest transaction: 1.59 Shortest transaction: 0.02
